resources: --contains all strings HelloWorld Hello World! My name is Tatiana and I want to be an Android developer with a focus on geospatial applications! I have created mobile apps in Android Studio using Java, but my mobile development experience has been all self-taught, so I am hoping this course will fill the gaps in my knowledge. In addition, I am eager to learn Kotlin since it\'s the industry standard. Outside of coding, I love cats and 3D art. Say hello! Hello to you too!
